    • Method Detail

      • learn

        public void learn(String game,
                  int move,
                  boolean isOffense,
                  int player)
        Remembers plays passed in from games played by AI class
        Parameters:
        game - Game board as string.
        move - Proper move to make.
        isOffense - Tag play as offensive or defensive.
        player - 0 or 1 mapped to x or y.

      • learn

        public void learn(String game,
                  int move,
                  HashMap<String,HashSet<Integer>> memory)
        Remembers plays based on weather they are offensive or defensive.
        Parameters:
        game - Game board as string.
        move - Proper move to make.
        memory - HashMap representing memoryOffensive or memoryDefensive

      • remember

        public HashSet<Integer> remember(String game)
        Remember play based on status of a board.
        Parameters:
        game - Game board as string.
        Returns:
        Possible moves to make.
